repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04 
MAINTAINER Dylan Jhaveri <dylan@mustwin.com> 

RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
build-essential \
git-core \
nodejs-legacy \
npm \
&& npm install -g grunt-cli bower && npm cache clean --force; && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /app 

ONBUILD ADD package.json /app/package.json 
ONBUILD ADD bower.json /app/bower.json 
ONBUILD ADD . /app 
ONBUILD RUN cd /app 
 \
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force; ONBUILD
ONBUILD RUN bower install --allow-root 

CMD [ "grunt" ]
